introduction.title: Welcome to the migration
introduction.contentHeadline: Pick up where you left off
introduction.contentInformation: The Migration Assistant will help establish a connection between your shop system and Shopware 6 to transfer and migrate your data.

connectionSelect.title: Migration – Changing the connection
connectionSelect.contentInformation: Select an existing connection from the list to update the data.

connectionCreate.title: Migration – Create a connection
connectionCreate.contentInformation: The following information is required to perform the migration.
connectionCreate.profileTooltip: Describes the type of source system.
connectionCreate.gatewayTooltip: The type of connection between the systems.
connectionCreate.connectionTooltip: Enter a unique name for the connection.
connectionCreate.connectionNameTooShort: The connection name must be at least 6 characters long.

hint.local: Note: The shop systems have to be on the same server. You need access data to the database.

shopware55Api.contentInformation: The required plugin “Migration Connector” is free and can be found in your Shopware 5 backend under Plugin Manager > Extensions > Migration tools. Please install and activate the plugin to proceed.

credentials.title: Migration – Establish a connection
credentials.emptyState: Sorry no form for selected profile found.

api.contentInformation: You need valid API credentials to establish a connection between Shopware 5 and Shopware 6. Your API credentials can be found in your Shopware 5 backend under “User administration”. API access needs to be activated there and confirmed by saving.
api.apiKeyTooltip: The API key is used for security and identification.
api.apiKeyInvalid: The API key does not have the correct length ({length}/40 characters).
api.endpointSSLLabel: My shop uses a secure connection (SSL)

local.contentInformation: We still need access data to connect to your Shopware 5 database.

success.undefinedErrorMsg: An unknown error occurred while checking the SSL certificate from the specified shop domain.
success.SWAG_MIGRATION__REQUEST_CERTIFICATE_INVA: We have determined that the SSL certificate of the specified shop domain is not secure. Check the certificate for your own security.

error.undefinedErrorMsg: Internal server error. Please try again.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__GATEWAY_READ: Could not connect to the server. Please check the given shop domain.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__CONNECTION_AUTHENTICATIO: Your credentials are incorrect. Please check them and try again.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLED: The required plugin “Migration Connector” is not installed in Shopware 5. Please install the free plugin and try again.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__DATABASE_CONNECTION_ERRO: Database connection could not be established.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__IS_RUNNING: A migration is currently in progress. Therefore, you cannot edit the credentials until the migration is complete.

emptyScreen.title: No connection
emptyScreen.description: Make sure that a connection has been established between the systems. This is required for the migration. You can find more information here:{linebreak}{link}

index.title: General
index.pluginVersionText: Please make sure your Shopware 5 backend is using the latest version of the Migration Connector Plugin.

confirmDialog.title: Delete access data
confirmDialog.content: There will be no active connection after this. Enter your access data again to restore the connection.
confirmDialog.contentHint: Would you like to delete the current access data?

connection.title: Set up a connection
connection.content: The Migration Assistant will help establish a connection between your shop system and Shopware 6 to transfer and migrate your data.

dataSelection.title: Specify data for migration
dataSelection.content: Select the data you want to migrate. It is possible to include plugin data as well, should the plugin already be available for Shopware 6. Check for plugin availability in your Shopware account.

migrationOverview.title: Migration steps
migrationOverview.content: 1. An automatic process checks the selected data for missing assignments. Prepare to complete the automatic process by adding manual assignments.{linebreak}2. Your shop‘s data is read and assigned.{linebreak}3. All selected and properly assigned data gets transferred to Shopware 6.{linebreak}4. Media items are downloaded.

premappingCard.validCaption: The data is ready to proceed
premappingCard.loadingCaption: The existing data has been checked.
premappingCard.unfilledTitle: The data check has been completed
premappingCard.unfilledCaption: You can only continue after the manual assignment has been completed.
premappingCard.unfilledAlert: We have detected that there is data that requires manual assignment.

FETCH_DATA.long: The data will be read from your system
FETCH_DATA.caption: The new assignments are processed.
FETCH_DATA.hint: Tip: The migration continues step by step in the background, explore Shopware 6.

WRITE_DATA.long: The data is being written in Shopware 6
WRITE_DATA.caption: Depending on the shop size it may take a few moments.
WRITE_DATA.hint: Tip: You can pause and resume the migration process at any time.

PROCESS_MEDIA_FILES.caption: Large image data can take some time to process.
PROCESS_MEDIA_FILES.hint: Tip: If the connection is poor, pause the download and continue later.

success.title: The migration was successful
success.caption: We've created a summary for you with all details about the migration process.

warning.title: The migration was successful
warning.caption: Some data could not be migrated. You can see which data was migrated and which errors occurred in the summary.

pauseScreen.title: The migration is paused
pauseScreen.message: You didn't pause? If there is no internet connection, the migration automatically switches to pause mode to prevent data loss.

running.title: Migration already started
running.message: There is already a migration running in another browser or browser tab. You may now either take over the running migration or cancel it.

interrupted.title: Migration has been taken over
interrupted.message: The migration process was taken over from another browser or browser tab. You can cancel or take over the process, depending on the current status of the migration.

aborted.title: Migration was cancelled
aborted.message: Another user has cancelled the migration process in a separate browser or browser tab. Please start a new migration.

forbidden.title: Migration already started
forbidden.message: A migration has already been started in another browser or browser tab. Please switch to this tab to view the migration process.

takeoverModal.title: Take over migration
takeoverModal.message: It is possible to take over the active migration. If you would like, you may continue the migration in this browser window.
takeoverModal.hint: Would you like to take over the migration?

abortModal.title: Cancel migration
abortModal.message: It is not possible to take over the active migration at the moment. If you would like, you may now cancel the active migration and start a new one directly afterwards.
abortModal.hint: Would you like to cancel the migration?

redirectModal.title: Migration complete
redirectModal.message: The migration has already been completed in another browser or browser tab.

connectionLostScreen.title: The connection has been lost
connectionLostScreen.message: The migration ended the process to avoid data loss. Check the internet connection and start a new migration.

confirmAbortDialog.title: Stop migration
confirmAbortDialog.content: The migration is not fully complete. Already migrated data might be unusable. If you quit now, you will have to completely rerun the migration process.
confirmAbortDialog.hint: Do you want to stop the migration?

authorizationError.information: Authorization error. Your access data is not correct. Please check it and try again.

error.canNotConnectToServer: No connection to server. Please check the connection for issues.

customerExists.information: Customer with email "{mail}" already exists. You cannot add this user with that email to your database.

migrationContextPropertyMissing.information: Required property "{notFoundProperty}" for migration context not found.

migrationsWorkloadPropertyMissing.information: Required property "{notFoundProperty}" for migration workload not found.

noFileSystemPermissions.information: No file system permissions to create or write files or directories. Please check your permissions.

undefinedIndex.title: Unidentified index
undefinedIndex.detail: Unidentified index could not be found.
undefinedIndex.information: Index "{unidentifiedIndex}" could not be found. Please check your data.

error.unknownError: Unknown error. You can check the logging table of your database for more information.
error.mediaProcessConnectionError: A connection error occurred while copying the media data. Please check the connection.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__WRITER_NOT_FOUND: File writer for "{entity}" entity not found.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_PARENT_ENTITY: Parent entity for "{entity}" child not found.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_ASSOCIATION_R: Mapping of "{missingEntity}" is missing, but it is a required association for "{requiredFor}". Please migrate "{missingImportEntity}" first to continue.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_EMPTY_NECESSA: {entity} entity could not be converted, because of the empty required field: {fields} | {entity} entity could not be converted, because of the empty required fields: {fields}
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_NO_DEFAULT_SH: Default shipping address of the customer is empty, therefore the default billing address will be used.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_NO_DEFAULT_BI: Default billing address of customer is empty, therefore the default shipping address will be used.
Default billing and shipping address of customer are empty, therefore the first address will be used.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_PRODUCT_MEDIA: Product media could not be converted.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_PROPERTY_MEDI: Property media could not be converted.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_EMPTY_LOCALE: Category entity could not be converted, because of empty locale.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_NO_ADDRESS_DA: Customer entity could not be converted, because of empty address data.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_NOT_CONVERT_A: Translation of object type “{objectType}“ could not be converted.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_INVALID_UNSER: {entity} translation entity could not be converted, because of invalid, unserialized object data.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_SOURCE_FILE_N: The source file could not be found. File: {path}
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_CANNOT_COPY_D: The source file could not be copied. File: {path}
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_UNKNOWN_ORDER: Order entity could not be converted, because of unknown order state.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_UNKNOWN_TRANS: Transaction entity could not be converted, because of unknown transaction state.
error.SWAG_MIGRATION__SHOPWARE55_UNKNOWN_CUSTO: Customer data could not be converted due to unknown salutation.
